```{r setup}
library(robcovsel)
```

```{r data generation}
gen = genevar(e = 0.1)
x = gen$x
y = gen$y
```

```{r}
system.time({fit1 = covlasso(x,y,cor.method = "pair",scale.method = "qn")})  
system.time({fit2 = covlasso(x,y,cor.method = "gaussrank",scale.method = "qn")})

fit1$pda.method
fit1$adaptive
fit1$lmin
head(fit1$betahat_opt)
```
